Address Restore Password Verification Code Suggestions & Complaints Record From To Display All Search Code Producer Before Discount Discount Total Date Monthly Reports Operations About Waffr FAQ what is waffr? what does waffr do? why should i prefer to order from waffr? How much does waffr services using cost?
Wffr is a leading company that connects customers with their favorite restaurants over the Internet and operates in the State of Kuwait \ n We provide an easy and fast way to connect customers with their favorite restaurants. All it takes is simple and easy steps, using your personal computer, your mobile phone, or even your tablet device, to choose your preferred order through Wffr. We simply receive the order submitted by you and send it to the restaurant through a connected program between Wffr and the restaurant, so you do not have to deal with the hassles of submitting the order by phone, and we make sure that you receive your order on time. Wffr is a huge dining hall for many restaurants, so you do not need to go through the hassle of remembering restaurant numbers, waiting on the phone, getting a busy response when managing the restaurant number, or getting the wrong order due to a mistake in calling the phone. Besides, by using Wffr, you can view menus, pictures of dishes and pictures of all your favorite restaurants through our website in an easy way. The only additional cost that can be added to the order value relates only to the restaurant delivery fee.
SignIn what if i forgot my password? How to order from waffr? How to register my data? How to use waffr services? How to join waffr? How to cancel my order? why should i register? some restaurants i like don\'t exist in waffr? How to dial through waffr? How to buy coupon? If you repeatedly enter the email / password 5 times, your account will be temporarily suspended. The system will automatically send the email confirmation link to your email address, and you must click on this link in order to activate your account. In this email, we will also ask you to choose a new password to use for FoodBoy. Simply, follow these instructions:
a. Initially, you can order as a registered member or as a speed-order without registration. Click here to register. B. Choose the region you live in and click "Order" C. Choose your favorite restaurant from the list by clicking on the name or logo. Dr.. Check the box next to your choice of item and add the number in the quantity you want next to the box. Scroll to the bottom of the page to view all the listings and click Next through the cart. E. Make sure all the information is correct, then press "Submit Order" to fulfill your request. Your order will be directed to the restaurant immediately. It should be noted that if you use our service for the first time, we will call your mobile phone number in order to verify your data.
Weekly Offers Discount New Products What Is Your Governorate Wrong Email OR PassWord Featured Offers No Offers exist Signed In Successfully Dial Favourite Offers Total Billed offers You can cancel your order (either cash, prepaid, or credit cards) within 5 minutes of submitting your order. Please note that you cannot cancel your order afterwards due to the ability to fulfill your order by the restaurant. In the event that your order is delayed for more than 20 minutes after the delivery time specified by the restaurant, you can also cancel your order. For prepaid card requests, please read the terms and conditions of the prepaid card.
(Payment service by prepaid cards is only available on our website dedicated to serving the State of Kuwait and the Kingdom of Bahrain)
You can speak with the help employee directly online during business hours every day 24 hours a day, or by calling the hotline, or sending your suggestions through the Share your opinion button on the home page. At the bottom of the home page, click on the Talabat Gift Coupons icon, then choose the desired gift coupon amount.
In the event that the recipient does not register with Talabat, the recipient of the gift coupon must register to benefit from this gift coupon after clicking on the confirmation link in the confirmation email. Upon registering an account, the gift coupon will be automatically converted to Talabat balance with the same value as the gift coupon.\nIn the event that the user has an account with Talabat, then when you click on the confirmation link in the electronic notification message, the user will be able to see the gift coupon on the “My Account” page, and the gift coupon will be automatically transferred to the order balance of the same value of the gift coupon.In the event that the user has an account with Talabat, then when you click on the confirmation link in the electronic notification message, the user will be able to see the gift coupon on his account page "My Account" and the gift coupon will be automatically transferred to the order balance of the same value of the gift coupon. (This service is only available on our website dedicated to serving the State of Kuwait)

We are a team of digital marketing specialists working in Egypt and the Arab world.\n\nOur vision is to provide professional services to our clients, and to work on continuous development in our capabilities and capabilities, to achieve our mission in implementing our projects perfectly.\ \n\nProfessional implementation of projects and achieving the customer\'s vision in his new website or the marketing services that we provide to him in accordance with the marketing rules and consumer behavior\.\n\nOur goals are to gain the confidence of our customers through their satisfaction with our services that we provide to them with love, and then the circle of our customers is expanding day by day and we are always at the forefront langwaffr passwaffr
